mapper.select:
select
FROM naxin as n LEFT JOIN dept_name as a ON n.d_id=a.id LEFT JOIN dept_stu as b ON n.dept_id=b.id LEFT JOIN class_name as c on n.class_id=c.id LEFT JOIN jibie as d on n.ji_id=d.jid LEFT JOIN stu_user as e on n.u_id=e.id where na_id = #{naId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
